name: Buy Cats
description:
Get money, buy cats. Earn more money with cats to buy more cats.

Buying cats satisfies a void that only buying cats can fulfill.

How many cats will you buy? Ten? Twenty? Ten-thousand?

Buy lots and lots of cats in Buy Cats.

  • More cats gives more money... to buy more cats with.
  • Unlock food and toys to earn more money... to buy more cats with.
